text: Julia Deeb-Swihart has been awarded the National Institute of Justice Graduate Fellowship.
Emily Wall has been awarded the D.E. Shaw Exploration Fellowship.
Alex Endert gave an invited talk titled Considering Cognitive Bias during Interactive Visual Analysis at the 2019 TRIPODS Southwest Conference.
Bahador Saket gave an invited talk titled Visualization by Demonstration at the 2019 TRIPODS Southwest Conference.
Emily Wall has been awarded the Siemens FutureMaker Fellowship.
